name: Final Defense
overview: Published in COMPUTE!'s Gazette 1989/12 (Issue #78). They've finally broken through. In "Final Defense' hundreds of enemy ships are approaching by sea, and an equal number of tanks are converging on you by land. You're the last defender. And before they take you, you must, wipe out as many of them as possible. If only you could hold on long enough for reinforcements to arrive.
